generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and a bicycle lane, extending into the distance with vehicles and cyclists on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the building, and also on the right side where bicycles are parked.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and balconies is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Several people are visible walking or sitting on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- rider: A person is visible riding a bicycle on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan in the middle of the road and several other cars further ahead.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road, near the bicycles.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the right side of the road, next to the sidewalk.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging above the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road, including a yellow sign on the right side.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the road, supporting traffic lights and signs.
- wall: A wall is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the road, separating the sidewalk from the parking area.
